Author: mk#2748
Content: Just deployed a new KMD pool at https://komodo.wattpool.net  Come help spread decentralization, and help us crack our first block!  Let us know if we should open a new difficulty stratum port for your miner.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: miners, we are testing adaptivepow that is a way to recover from diff stranding

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: above is the pool, if you can point hash to it in the next half hour or so and push the hashrate up as high as possible, we can see how well it does

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: this is the first implementation of https://medium.com/@jameslee777/adaptivepow-the-solution-to-diff-stranding-of-smaller-blockchains-425609df5563

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: i am working with zawy to make it even better, but we wanted to document the current baseline performance

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: We will start in about 40 mins. pool is ready. if you are interested, please prepare your miners to point to the above pool at the same time. @mrlynch is also participating at that time with us.

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: if you have over Z11 or renting from nicehash, please use port 3033. e.g: `stratum+tcp://178.159.11.114:3033`

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: we just need about half an hour to max the difficulty and then we will use a single CPU core to recover the chain back to normal!

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it would be great if someone can make a detailed blog post about this test, with all the details. it does solve a very large problem for all the smaller blockchains

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: we have almost 1.2Msol for this test starting in 15 mins. anyone else wants to join, please get ready and let us know.
